description: This detection method points out highly relevant Antivirus events
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Arnim Rupp
false_positives: Some software piracy tools (key generators, cracks) are classified as hack tools
name: Relevant Anti-Virus Event
query: (winlog.channel:Application AND ((/\*[Aa][Dd][Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd]\*/) OR (/\*[Aa][Ss][Pp]\/[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Aa][Tt][Kk]\/\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\.[Aa][Ss][Pp]\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Bb][Aa][Ll][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\.[Jj][Ss][Pp]\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\.[Pp][Hh][Pp]\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Ll][Aa][Cc][Kk][Ww][Oo][Rr][Mm]\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Rr][Uu][Tt][Ee][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Bb][Rr][Uu][Tt][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Hh][Oo][Pp][Pp][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Oo][Bb][Aa][Ll][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Oo][Bb][Ee][Aa][Cc][Oo][Nn]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Oo][Mm][Ee][Tt][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Rr][Yy][Pp][Tt][Ee][Ss]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Rr][Yy][Pp][Tt][Oo][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Dd][Ee][Ss][Tt][Rr][Uu][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp][Cc][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ss]\*/) OR (/\*[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Cc][Vv][Ee]\*/) OR (/\*[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Ff][Aa][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ee][Pp][Rr][Oo][Xx][Yy]\*/) OR (/\*[Gg][Rr][Aa][Nn][Dd][Cc][Rr][Aa][Bb]\*/) OR (/\*[Hh][Aa][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Hh][Kk][Tt][Ll]\.\*/) OR (/\*[Hh][Kk][Tt][Ll]\/\*/) OR (/\*[Hh][Kk][Tt][Ll]\:\*/) OR (/\*[Hh][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Ee][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Ii][Ii][Ss][Ee][Xx][Cc][Hh][Gg][Ss][Pp][Aa][Ww][Nn][Cc][Mm][Dd]\*/) OR (/\*[Jj][Ss][Pp]\/[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Kk][Ee][Yy][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Kk][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ii][Cc]\*/) OR (/\*[Kk][Rr][Yy][Pp][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Ll][Aa][Zz][Aa][Gg][Nn][Ee]\*/) OR (/\*[Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Mm][Ee][Tt][Aa][Ss][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Mm][Ee][Tt][Ee][Rr][Pp][Rr][Ee][Tt][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Mm][Ee][Tt][Ee][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Mm][Ii][Mm][Ii][Kk][Aa][Tt][Zz]\*/) OR (/\*[Mm][Pp][Rr][Ee][Tt][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Nn][Ii][Gg][Hh][Tt][Hh][Aa][Ww][Kk]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Ee][Dd]\.[Gg][Ee][Nn][Ee][Rr][Ii][Cc]\.347\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt][Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Hh][Oo][Bb][Oo][Ss]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Hh][Pp]\/[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Dd][Oo][Oo][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Oo][Tt][Aa][Tt][Oo]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ss][Hh]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Ss][Hh][Ll][Ss][Pp][Yy]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Ss][Ww][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Ww][Cc][Rr][Aa][Cc][Kk]\*/) OR (/\*[Pp][Ww][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\*/) OR (/\*[Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Oo][Mm]\*/) OR (/\*[Rr][Oo][Zz][Ee][Nn][Aa]\*/) OR (/\*[Rr][Yy][Zz][Ee][Rr][Ll][Oo]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Bb][Ee][Ll][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Ee][Aa][Tt][Bb][Ee][Ll][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Pp][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Ll][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Pp][Ll][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr]\*/) OR (/\*[Ss][Ww][Rr][Oo][Rr][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Tt][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Yy][Pp][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Tt][Ee][Ss][Ll][Aa][Cc][Rr][Yy][Pp][Tt]\*/) OR (/\*[Vv][Aa][Ll][Yy][Rr][Ii][Aa]\*/) OR (/\*[Ww][Ee][Bb][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\*/)) AND (NOT ((((/\*[Kk][Ee][Yy][Gg][Ee][Nn]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Rr][Aa][Cc][Kk]\*/) OR (/\*[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii]_[Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Oo][Mm][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]_[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\*/) OR (/\*[Cc][Yy][Bb][Ee][Rr]\-[Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt]\-[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\*/))) OR (Level:4) OR (Provider_Name:/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Rr][Ee][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/))))
